dotp[source]

Get dot product of 2 vectors

mmult[source]

mmult(m1, m2)

Get product of 2 matrices

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
m1 = np.random.rand(3,2)
m2 = np.random.rand(2,4)
m3 = mmult(m1, m2)
print(m1)
print(m2)
print(m3)
